# Cancel

**Instance Method**

Cancels all callbacks from the event source.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t Cancel(IODispatchSourceCancelHandlerhandler);
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: The handler block to execute after any interrupt callbacks finish.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. See [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

After cancellation, the source can only be freed. It cannot be reactivated.

## Starting and Stopping the Interrupt Source

- **SetEnableWithCompletion**: Enables or disables the delivery of interrupts.
- **IODispatchSourceCancelHandler**: A block to execute when a canceled dispatch source stops executing tasks.
